original_definition: 'low noise refrigerating appliance' means a refrigerating appliance without vapour compression and with airborne acoustical noise emission lower than 27 A-weighted decibel referred to 1 pico watt (dB(A) re 1 pW);
generated_definition: 'low noise refrigerating appliance' means for all refrigerating appliances, except for low noise refrigerating appliances, a refrigerating appliance that emits a sound power level of less than 40 db(a) during its rated operating period, as determined in accordance with annex i of this regulation.

Article 2: ‘low noise refrigerating appliance’ means a refrigerating appliance without vapour compression and withairborne acoustical noise emission lower than 27 A-weighted decibel referred to 1 pico watt (dB(A) re 1 pW);
